name: Abul Kashem
body: One of the best product in our entire generation. Extraordinary picture quality.

name: Hashem Ali
body: Great viewing angle. Vivid color. Most bright TV I have ever used.

name: Jannatun Naim
body: Best value for money. According to price exceptional quality.

name: Misir Ali
body: Who knows the best picture quality will be seen very soon. More than satisfied.

name: Mahmud Hasan
body: Most unique design, premium look and very much affordable.

name: Kamrul Islam
body: Probably the best TV in the market right now. No compromise in quality.
